column2: Shares of Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co. bounced Monday, after J.P. Morgan analyst Ryan Brinkman said the stock's biggest selloff in nearly 35 years on the back of disappointing financial guidance was an "overreaction," and provided a compelling buy opportunity for investors.
column4: Goodyear Tire stock’s worst day in 35 years created ‘deep value’ and a good reason to buy, analyst says
